extendedInfo.description: Connect 4 is a classic two-player game in which the players first choose a color and then take turns dropping their colored discs from the top into a 7*6 grid. The object of the game is to connect four of one's own discs of the same color next to each other vertically, horizontally, or diagonally before one's opponent can do so.Super Connect 4 lets you play with 4 difficulty levels of computer AI with superb graphics in One Player mode. The Easy level is pretty simple to conquer but the expert level is extremely hard for gamers to beat. We also provide you Player vs. Player mode and Online Play mode.Game Features:1) 4 different difficulty levels in One Player mode2) Player vs. Player mode3) Online Play mode - play with players all over the world4) Game Center support - you can submit your total score to online Leaderboard. (Your score depends on the number of your wins and the difficulty of the game you choose.)Notes: You can either play with random opponents or search a friend to play in Online Play mode.
